cards.rules_text: When this creature enters or dies, exile target card from an opponent’s graveyard.

Whenever this creature and at least two other creatures attack, it gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.

Flying, deathtouch
{1}: This creature gains haste until end of turn.
When this creature enters, mill two cards, then create a 1/1 black Fungus creature token with “During your turn, this token has deathtouch.”

Destroy target creature or planeswalker. 
Surveil 2.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Surveil 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life unless three or more colors of mana were spent to cast this spell.

Reach
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power less than or equal to the number of colors in your aurora.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, if there are two or more kinds of counters among creatures you control, draw a card.

When this creature enters, create two 1/1 green Rabbit creature tokens.
Forestcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Put a trample counter on it.
Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. If that permanent’s mana value was 3 or less, surveil 2.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Reach
As long as your aurora has three or more colors, this creature gets +2/+0.

When this creature enters, choose one —
• It deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]

When this creature enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Menace
When a creature scavenges this creature, return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Scavenge {4}{U} [i]({4}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card’s power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Vigilance

This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are seven or more lands you control and/or land cards in your graveyard.
Surveil 3, then draw three cards.

Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If you controlled that creature, aetherize it. [i](Create a token that’s a copy of it, then exile that token. Copies include merged parts.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Vigilance
When this creature dies, if its power was 2 or greater, draw a card.
Scavenge {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card’s power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a Revelation spell, surveil 1.

Destroy target creature or artifact. If it was a token or tapped permanent, you gain 3 life.

Incarnate {3}{W} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control. They gain first strike until end of turn.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, for each color in your aurora beyond the first, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copies.

Mill seven cards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put seven cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
Draw a card.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as there are three or more colors in your aurora, you may play lands and cast creature spells from the top of your library.

This spell can’t be countered.
This creature enters with your choice of a vigilance or trample counter.
{1}, Remove a counter from this creature: It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

Create a 1/1 green Rabbit creature token. If X is 1 or more, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token with trample. The same is true for 2 or more and a 3/3 green Elk creature token and 3 or more and a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

Incarnate {3}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Copy target noncreature spell you control twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Each player mills six cards. You may cast a creature card and a noncreature card not named Crest the Stars milled this way without paying their mana costs.
Exile the top two cards of target opponent’s library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

You may cast this spell for {3}. Spend only colored mana produced by effects that add mana of any color this way.
Mill six cards, then return up to one land card, up to one creature card, and up to one noncreature nonland card milled this way to your hand.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature unless you control a Dragon or planeswalker.
Exile target nonland permanent.

Menace
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If this isn’t the first time this ability has resolved this turn, create a 2/1 red Crocodile creature token with menace and “This token can’t block.”

Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If a land card was returned this way, you may have it become a 6/6 Frog Golem creature with trample in addition to its other types.

Choose two —
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains trample and lifelink until end of turn.
• Return up to one target noncreature nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
• Create two Treasure tokens.
Exile Burn the Sky Down.

Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token with trample.
Exile Howl of Ancestry.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Flying, haste
As long as your aurora has three or more colors, this creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
Menace
If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage instead.

Molten Infusion is all colors. [i](It can contribute any single color to an aurora.)[/i]
Molten Infusion deals 3 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
When this creature enters, if it was cast, return each other nonland permanent with mana value less than the number of land cards in your graveyard to their owners’ hands.

Flying
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, put that many screech counters on this creature.
As an additional cost to cast spells, you may remove X screech counters from this creature, where X is its mana value. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Draw X cards, then discard a card.
Search your library for a Vali card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Exile Vali’s Yearning.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast instant or sorcery spells from the top of your library. When you do, you may have this enchantment become an X/X Avatar creature with flying until end of turn, where X is the mana spent to cast that spell.

This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control an Avatar.
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token. If it was a Revelation, put a +1/+1 counter on the token.

Creature tokens you control get +2/+2 and have flying.
{2}{W}, Discard this: Create a tapped 3/3 green Elk creature token.

If an opponent has more life than you, you gain 4 life. If an opponent controls more lands than you, create a Treasure token. If an opponent controls more creatures than you, create two 1/1 green Rabbit creature tokens.

• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If its power is less than 4, put +1/+1 counters on it equal to the difference.
Creatures without counters on them get -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Create a token that’s a copy of up to one target artifact or creature you control, except it’s an artifact and loses all other types.
[+1]: Target artifact or creature you control becomes a 3/3 Dragon creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types.
[-3]: Eiyo deals 4 damage to any nonplayer target and you gain 4 life. Create X Treasure tokens, where X is the excess damage dealt this way.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “You may cast copies of cards in your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact and exiling the card in addition to its other costs.”

Prowess, ward {1}
This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power less than or equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you’ve cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
[-1]: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
[-5]: For each player, search their library for an instant or sorcery card, exile it, then shuffle that library. You may cast any number of cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When this creature enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Incarnate {5}{G} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens with trample.

Aurora [i](When this enters and at your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If your aurora has three or more colors, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn instead.
Create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with prowess. Then if {U}{R} was spent to cast this spell, create a tapped Treasure token.
Tectonic Hazard deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.
Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

When this creature enters, up to one target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. 
Swampcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]

{W}{U} REVELATIONS Witness the majesty of the ascendant by turning your small creatures and spells into powerful combinations!
{U}{B} SABOTEURS Predate the night by slinking past your opponent’s blockers and going for the life total directly.
{B}{R} AURORA CONTROL Play the long game as you remove threats, cast off-color spells and accrue value until your aurora is complete.
{R}{G} AURORA MIDRANGE Beat your opponent down with on-curve threats then boost them all with your aurora!
{G}{W} ABILITY COUNTERS Have your creatures share their abilities for the good of the collective as you capitalize off different counters.
{W}{B} +1/+1 COUNTERS Scavenge the flesh of the dead to grow your threats. Your opponent’s life total is next!
{B}{G} GO-WIDE Grow your board before you infect them all with a fungal buff to swing for lethal.
{G}{U} LANDS Put lands in your graveyard and onto the battlefield to cast your huge threats faster!
{U}{R} SPELLSLINGER AGGRO Use elemental infusions to blast your opponent with spells before they can react.
{R}{W} BLINK Aetherize and reuse your powerful enters effects until nobody can compete with the value.

Menace
Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

Trample
This creature gets +1/+1 as long as you’ve cast a spell that’s white, blue, black, or green this turn.

Incarnate {3}{U} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Mill three cards, then you may return a card milled this way to your hand.
Flying

Destroy target creature. If this spell was incarnated, gain control of it instead.
